mapper.select: SELECT s.id_seller as idSeller, s.id_person as idPerson, s.id_user as idUser, u.password as password, u.email as email, p.first_name as firstName, p.last_name as lastName, p.phone_number as phoneNumber, s.image_path as imagePath FROM seller s INNER JOIN user u on s.id_user=u.id_user INNER JOIN person p on s.id_person=p.id_person WHERE s.id_seller = #{sellerId} and s.status = 1 and u.status = 1 and p.status = 1
SELECT s.id_seller as idSeller FROM seller s WHERE s.id_user = #{userId} and s.status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE seller SET status=1,image_path=#{imagePath}, tx_date=#{transaction.txDate}, tx_id_user=#{transaction.txIdUser},tx_host=#{transaction.txHost},tx_update=#{transaction.txUpdate} WHERE id_seller=#{idSeller} and status = 1
UPDATE seller SET image_path=#{imagePath} WHERE id_seller=#{idSeller} and status = 1
